disk.name: Combo (Recommended)
disk.description: 49MB multi-slice disk with CP/M 2.2, games, and utilities. Best starter disk.

disk.name: Infocom Games
disk.description: Zork 1-3, Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, Enchanter trilogy, and more.

disk.name: CP/M 2.2
disk.description: Digital Research CP/M 2.2 operating system. The classic 8-bit OS.

disk.name: ZSDOS
disk.description: Z-System DOS - Enhanced CP/M compatible OS with date/time stamping.

disk.name: ZPM3
disk.description: Z-System CP/M 3 - Enhanced CP/M Plus with ZCPR support.
